title: Fable
description:
Say goodbye to manual work & build demos effortlessly with AI. 

Interactive demos & guides are needed by teams of all sizes. Be it marketing teams to increase engagement, sales teams to close deals faster, or customer success teams to ease onboarding. 

Creating these demos is no mean feat. Writing content, working on design & customizing the narrative is not easy. And that is what Fable helps with. With just a simple prompt, Fable's demo copilot creates stunning interactive demos and guides.
